Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the photo is real.
Falters at times: The claim falters as it relies on a misleading Facebook post and a doctored image.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is genuine without verifying its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the photo has been manipulated using photo editing techniques.
Understate: The claim understates the extent of manipulation in the photo, as parts of the crowd have been cloned.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo is doctored and not a real representation of the crowds supporting Indian PM Modi.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the photo by presenting it as a real depiction of the support for PM Modi.
